name: Calista Vivienne Wightman
appearance: 5'3", petite; dark brown hair; hazel-brown eyes
key_info: Adopted Levi after an affair; fears the truth emerging.
body: Polished hospitality with a ledger under the tea tray.

name: Nathaniel James Ashford III, M.D.
key_info: Widower; keeps the practice open past his limits.
body: He treats pain like a language.

name: Davia Evangaline Hansley
key_info: Devoted to missing brother; almost-relationship with Levi.
body: She writes as if ink could keep people from vanishing.
